feed.subtitle: Ashton Kutcher reportedly attended Madonna’s Oscar party and stayed until 4:30 a.m., even though Madonna is BFFs with Demi Moore. Totes cool or jerky move?

content.div:
Ashton Kutcher reportedly attended Madonna’s Oscar party and stayed until 4:30 a.m., even though Madonna is BFFs with Demi Moore. Totes cool or jerky move?

--

Check out the new poster for The Avengers. Iron Man is helmetless, probably because the studio wants to show off Robert Downey Jr.'s pretty mug.

--

February is the month of love, and American Idol is giving back by airing an extra live episode tonight. Um, thanks?

--

Megan Fox is blabbing about Brian Austin Whatshisname, again.

--

She also claims that she's ready to give up her smokin' hot body to having children.

--

Kim Kardashian posted a random picture of herself sans makeup or shirt. Why? We're not sure...

--

Pippa Middleton and her brother (whose name we can never remember/cared to learn) are racing in a Swedish ski race.

--

Kelsey and Camille Grammer have settled their custody case, in case you care.

--

Julia Roberts says her kids have no idea their mother is famous. Do they live under a rock?

--

Anne Hathaway claims that she's more like Lindsay Lohan than people realize. Hmm…we’re going to need some photo/video proof, please!

--

Check back to Dose.ca throughout the day for your entertainment fix.

entry.title: Famous Feedback

link.Abstract: What did journalists think of Emma Watson's shorter 'do? Find out in this week's best celebrity quotes.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: "[Partying is] not my thing anymore. I went out, actually, a few months ago with a friend. And I was so uncomfortable. Not because I felt tempted, just because it was just the same thing that it always was before. And it just wasn't fun for me. I've become more of a homebody. And I like that." Lindsay Lohan
link.title: "[Partying is] not my thing anymore. I went out, actually, a few months ago with a friend. And I was so uncomfortable. Not because I felt tempted, just because it was just the same thing that it always was before. And it just wasn't fun for me. I've become more of a homebody. And I like that." Lindsay Lohan
